    Hi, I am Akshay!

    I am a Computer Vision Engineer at Invisible AI in San Francisco working on applied computer vision, edge-computing and baffling decision-making algorithms for industrial applications.

    This website is a collection of my current side projects, previous academic projects, work experience, skills, technical blogs and a lot more. More about me

    Check Out My Cool Robots!

    These blogs are more of a collection of my personal learnings/understandings assimilated from various other websites, courses, projects and experience and less of polished blogs or tutorials!

    But, hey if I do anyone any good with these, I don't mind! You can hit me up to talk more about them!
